Class JsonBackedComplexStubPersonAttributeDao

            • org.jasig.services.persondir.support.ComplexStubPersonAttributeDao
              • net.unicon.cas.addons.persondir.JsonBackedComplexStubPersonAttributeDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.jasig.services.persondir.IPersonAttributeDao, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier.ResourceChangedEvent>

    public class JsonBackedComplexStubPersonAttributeDao
extends org.jasig.services.persondir.support.ComplexStubPersonAttributeDao
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier.ResourceChangedEvent>
    A convenient wrapper around ComplexStubPersonAttributeDao that reads the configuration for its backingMap property from an external JSON configuration resource. This class supports periodic reloading of the backingMap from the external JSON resource by listening for ResourceChangedEvents and reacting to them.

    The polling of the JSON resource and detecting changes is done outside of this class.

    Since:
    0.7
    Author:
    Dmitriy Kopylenko, Unicon, inc.
    See Also:
    ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier

      • onApplicationEvent

        public void onApplicationEvent(ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier.ResourceChangedEvent resourceChangedEvent)
        Reload person attributes when JSON config is changed. In case of un-marshaling errors, or any other errors, do not disturb running CAS server by propagating the exceptions, but instead log the error and leave the previously cached person attributes state alone.
        Specified by:
        onApplicationEvent in interface org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier.ResourceChangedEvent>
        Parameters:
        resourceChangedEvent - event representing the resource change. Might not actually correspond to this JSON config file, so the URI of it needs to be checked first.
